definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: I am a European, and one returns to one's roots .
sentences.chinese: 我是個歐洲人，總要葉落歸根。

sentences.english: They enjoy cof. fee more. They know more about the history of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲人和美國人不大一樣，他們更享受咖啡。

sentences.english: Europeans simply stole everything and claimed it as their own idea or invention.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲人竊爲己用還聲明是自己的想法或發明。

sentences.english: Hudson sailed farther north and west than any European before him.
sentences.chinese: 哈德遜比他以前的任何歐洲人航行的往北，往西。

sentences.english: Nothing astonishes a European more in the Chinese than their patience.
sentences.chinese: 沒有比中國人的忍耐更令歐洲人喫驚的了。

sentences.english: But now, the Europeans have come up in quality.
sentences.chinese: 但現在，歐洲人的葡萄酒質量趕上來了。

sentences.english: They did not use paper money or gold or silver coins , as Europeans did.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有向歐洲人似的用紙幣或是金，銀做成的硬幣。

sentences.english: Brent Scowcroft said that's where the Europeans can help.
sentences.chinese: 斯考克羅夫特表示，這是歐洲人可以幫忙的地方。

sentences.english: The European startup provides how-to guides in English and Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲人開始提供英語和西班牙語的指引指南。

sentences.english: Europeans and Jews do not readily assimilate.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲人和猶太人不易同化。

sentences.english: Early Europeans believed in evil spirits, witches, ghosts and trolls.
sentences.chinese: 早期歐洲人相信惡鬼，巫婆，鬼，巨魔。

sentences.english: "No one will benefit more from this than Europeans, " Enders said recently.
sentences.chinese: “沒有人會比歐洲人從中受益更多，”恩德斯最近說。

sentences.english: Where America and Europe may differ is in the main cause of their risk-reducing zeal.
sentences.chinese: 美國人和歐洲人的不同之處在於他們降低風險的動機。

sentences.english: The episode should serve as a warning to Europeans.
sentences.chinese: 這個小插曲對歐洲人應是個警訊。

sentences.english: When, for example, a European gazes at a snowscape, he or she sees snow.
sentences.chinese: 譬如，當歐洲人觀照雪景時，他或她看的是隻是雪。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
